name: R5-MessageDefinition-R4-MessageDefinition
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 MessageDefinition into FHIR R4

element.display: A resource that defines a type of message that can be exchanged between systems

target.display: A resource that defines a type of message that can be exchanged between systems
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition`

element.display: Responses to this message

target.display: Responses to this message
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.allowedResponse` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.allowedResponse`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.allowedResponse.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageDefinition.allowedResponse.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

element.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing

target.display: Unique id for inter-element referencing
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.allowedResponse.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.allowedResponse.id`

element.display: Reference to allowed message definition response

target.display: Reference to allowed message definition response
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.allowedResponse.message` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.allowedResponse.message`

element.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.allowedResponse.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageDefinition.allowedResponse.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: When should this response be used

target.display: When should this response be used
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.allowedResponse.situation` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.allowedResponse.situation`

element.display: Definition this one is based on

target.display: Definition this one is based on
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.base` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.base`

element.display: consequence | currency | notification

target.display: consequence | currency | notification
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.category` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.category` - category has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/message-significance-category|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/message-significance-category|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: Contact details for the publisher

target.display: Contact details for the publisher
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.contact` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.contact`

element.display: Contained, inline Resources

target.display: Contained, inline Resources
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.contained` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.contained`

element.display: Use and/or publishing restrictions

target.display: Use and/or publishing restrictions
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.copyright` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.copyright`

element.display: Copyright holder and year(s)
Date last changed

target.display: Date last changed
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.date` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.date`

element.display: Natural language description of the message definition

target.display: Natural language description of the message definition
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.description` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.description`

element.display: Event code  or link to the EventDefinition

target.display: Event code  or link to the EventDefinition
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.event[x]` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.event[x]`

element.display: For testing purposes, not real usage

target.display: For testing purposes, not real usage
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.experimental` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.experimental`

element.display: Additional content defined by implementations

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageDefinition.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

target.display: Resource(s) that are the subject of the event
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.focus` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.focus`

element.display: Type of resource

target.display: Type of resource
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.focus.code` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.focus.code` - code has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/resource-types|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/resource-types|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

target.display: Additional content defined by implementations
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.focus.extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageDefinition.focus.extension` - extension has change due to type change: R5 `extension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `extension`

target.display: Extensions that cannot be ignored even if unrecognized
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.focus.modifierExtension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget to R4 `MessageDefinition.focus.modifierExtension` - modifierExtension has change due to type change: R5 `modifierExtension` `Extension` maps as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget for R4 `modifierExtension`

element.display: Canonical reference to a GraphDefinition

target.display: Canonical reference to a GraphDefinition
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.graph` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `MessageDefinition.graph` - graph changed from scalar to array (max cardinality from 1 to *)

target.display: Logical id of this artifact
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.id` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.id`

element.display: Business Identifier for a given MessageDefinition

target.display: A set of rules under which this content was created
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.implicitRules` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.implicitRules`

element.display: Intended jurisdiction for message definition (if applicable)

target.display: Intended jurisdiction for message definition (if applicable)
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.jurisdiction` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.jurisdiction`

element.display: Language of the resource content

target.display: Language of the resource content
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.language` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget to R4 `MessageDefinition.language` - language changed the binding strength from Required to Preferred; language has change due to type change: R5 `language` `code` maps as SourceIsNarrowerThanTarget for R4 `language`

element.display: always | on-error | never | on-success

target.display: always | on-error | never | on-success
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.responseRequired` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.responseRequired` - responseRequired has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/messageheader-response-request|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/messageheader-response-request|4.0.1 (Equivalent)

element.display: draft | active | retired | unknown

target.display: draft | active | retired | unknown
target.comment: R5 `MessageDefinition.status` maps as Equivalent to R4 `MessageDefinition.status` - status has compatible required binding for code type: http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|5.0.0 and http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/publication-status|4.0.1 (Equivalent)
